Html:
Hi,

Congratulations for the initiative of create a component .NET for PDF's creation by XSL-FO, but i have a problem.
In first call to your component, is giving a exception "System.ArithmeticException", for burst of arithmetic operation.

Tks for attention!!!

Anderson Lopes

Hi

Did you manage to resolve this issue?  If not, then feel free to provide more information and I will help if possible.

Cheers

Mark
